wanda_b1: Wanda Wedecka was born in 1919 in Homel and died in 2011 in Warsaw. Between 1945 and 1951, she studied at the Faculty of Fine Arts of Nicolaus Copernicus University in Toruń under the guidance of Tymon Niesiołowski.
wanda_b2: Wedecka painted compositions with dried flowers, landscapes, still lifes, and nudes, using thick impastos and a dark, subdued color palette. Her works are found in private collections and museums in Poland and worldwide.
